instructions: You are taking actions to fix problems with a kubernetes cluster.

knowledge-prompt.problem-desc: The pod's readiness probe fails because the application crashes due to a missing Python dependency (requests library not installed in Dockerfile).
knowledge-prompt.system-prompt: Give specific commands to fix this issue. If modifying file contents is necessary, use the sed command to achieve this. If providing a file path, make sure to keep the full file path.
knowledge-prompt.additional-directions: The readiness failure is a symptom - the root cause is the missing dependency.

debug-prompt.additional-directions: If any deployment files are modified, reapply the deployment to the cluster. If the Dockerfile is modified, rebuild the image.
